remarks: ` F ` is a function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem8.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ CC ) $.
etransclem8.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem8.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem8 $p |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
$d M j $.
$d X j x $.
$d j ph x $.
